description: Professional-grade text-to-video generation with advanced prompt optimization capabilities

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A Galactic Smuggler is a rogue figure with a cybernetic arm...

prompt_optimizer.description: Whether to use the model's prompt optimizer to enhance and expand your prompt

prompt_details.style_guide: Create rich, detailed narratives with character descriptions, world-building, and cinematic elements
best_practices: Use detailed character descriptions with specific traits
Add backstory and context for richer scenes
Use cinematic language and visual storytelling

example_prompts.title: Sci-Fi Character Story
example_prompts.prompt: A Galactic Smuggler is a rogue figure with a cybernetic arm and a well-worn coat that hints at many dangerous escapades across the galaxy. Their ship is filled with rare and exotic treasures from distant planets, concealed in hidden compartments, showing their expertise in illicit trade. Their belt is adorned with energy-based weapons, ready to be drawn at any moment to protect themselves or escape from tight situations. This character thrives in the shadows of space, navigating between the law and chaos with stealth and wit, always seeking the next big score while evading bounty hunters and law enforcement.

example_prompts.title: Fantasy Adventure
example_prompts.prompt: A mystical forest guardian with ancient runes glowing on their armor, standing watch over a sacred grove where magical creatures gather. Ethereal light filters through towering trees as the guardian's staff pulses with elemental energy, protecting the balance between the mortal and magical realms.

example_requests.title: Basic Story Generation
example_requests.description: Simple narrative-driven video with prompt optimization

request.prompt: A skilled archer practicing in a moonlit courtyard, arrows hitting targets with perfect precision

example_requests.title: Complex Character Scene
example_requests.description: Detailed character-driven scene with rich narrative

request.prompt: A cyberpunk detective walks through neon-lit streets, their augmented reality interface highlighting clues scattered throughout the urban landscape. Rain reflects the city lights as they pursue a case that will change everything.
A dragon flying over mountains at sunset

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: Enable prompt optimizer for richer, more detailed scenes
Use narrative storytelling with character development
Include specific visual and atmospheric details
limitations: Prompt optimizer may significantly change your original prompt
Complex narratives may require longer processing times
Best results with detailed, story-driven prompts

pricing.estimated_cost: Professional tier pricing for high-quality output
